resources.string: Press the zoom in button to access the zoom in or zoom out menu
Press the auto scroll button to activate automatic scroll
Swipe left to jump to the previous song
Swipe right to jump to the next song
Press the edit button to edit the current tab

Keep the auto scroll button pressed to adjust the duration of the song. If the song duration is made longer, the automatic scroll will be slower. If it is made shorter, the automatic scroll will be faster.
